name: In Reprise
description:
'In Reprise' Is a game made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam #4!

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4

You are a lost soul trying to recall one of your last memories. You can record your actions as you move and rewind them elsewhere to solve puzzles in this 2D sidescrolling puzzle-platformer.

Credits:

Jamie

Mike
Rick

Assets not made by us:

Art Assets :
"o lobster" - https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack
"Sky Background.png" Designed by mrsiraphol / Freepik

BGM - 'Sad Day' - Bensound.com
